thread.title: ‘Dramatic Threads: Textiles of Asia’ Review: The Very Fabric of Asian Societies

author: wsjcom
title: ‘Dramatic Threads: Textiles of Asia’ Review: The Very Fabric of Asian Societies

organizations.name: very fabric of asian societies newark

text:
Newark
“Dramatic Threads: Textiles of Asia” at the Newark Museum is not so much an exhibition as a roving spotlight, a clever way to refresh and recast the display of its permanent collection of Asian art. Katherine Anne Paul, the museum’s curator for arts of Asia, does this by highlighting the medium in a number of ways.
In the Japanese...
